ts
// vite.config.ts
import Components from 'unplugin-vue-components/vite';
import { LivWebResolver } from 'unplugin-liv-web';

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    Components({
      resolvers: [LivWebResolver()],
    }),
  ],
});
